All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
Represents a trading card entity stored in the database.
CardController
Main controller for the Trading Card Manager application.
CardDateUtil
Utility class for performing date-related calculations on card records.
CardDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for transferring card data between layers of the application.
CardImportException
Timothy Butler CEN 3024 - Software Development 1 June 18, 2025 CardImportException.java Custom unchecked exception used during the card import process.
CardMapper
Utility class for mapping between Card entities and CardDTO data transfer objects.
CardParser
Parses individual lines from an imported card data file into CardDTO objects.
CardRarity
Enumeration representing the different rarities a card can have.
CardRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD and custom operations on Card entities.
CardService
Service interface defining the contract for all card-related business operations.
CardServiceImpl
Implementation of the CardService interface containing business logic for managing cards in the Trading Card Manager application.
CardValidator
Validates the fields of a Card object to ensure data integrity before processing or persistence.
DatabaseConnectionController
Controller responsible for switching the application's database connection at runtime.
DatabaseCredentialsDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for encapsulating database connection credentials.
DataSourceConfig
Configuration class for the application's data source setup.
DateParser
Utility class for standardized date parsing and formatting throughout the application.
DynamicDataSource
Dynamic data source that allows runtime switching between multiple databases.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Timothy Butler CEN 3024 - Software Development 1 July 7, 2025 GlobalExceptionHandler.java This class provides centralized exception handling across the application.
ReadTextFile
Timothy Butler CEN 3024 - Software Development 1 June 18, 2025 ReadTextFile.java This class is responsible for reading a text file line-by-line and returning the contents as a list of strings.
TradingCardManagerApplication
Timothy Butler CEN 3024 - Software Development 1 June 18, 2025 TradingCardManagerApplication.java This is the main entry point of the Trading Card Manager application.
ValidatorResult
Represents the outcome of a validation check, encapsulating both success/failure and an associated message for display or logging purposes.
WebConfig
Web configuration for global CORS settings.
